title: Marketing Analytics Manager at Tempur Sealy International Inc in Lexington, KY

description:
Essential Duties, Responsibilities, and Key Results Area:
Develop analyses for the bedding market using qualitative and quantitative intelligence from several relevant data sources:
CRM, web analytics, and ERP databases. Lead multiple cross-functional analytics projects by working with key internal stakeholders to identify and scope new projects and liaison with appropriate business partners to execute projects. Define and produce deliverables that identify opportunities to shape consumer experiences and that inform and inspire internal stakeholders and decision makers. Develop and oversee data projects that may include knowledge of machine learning techniques and custom models to improve forecasts, produce business insights, and uncover trends that drive long-term business performance. Maintain necessary processes, controls and procedures to ensure accurate, high quality insights while partnering with the IT organization to design and drive processes that ensure data quality. Leverage the organization's industry leading investment in consumer research to consistently represent and elevate the voice of the consumer in all key new product, brand building and channel development initiatives. Build and develop the Insights and Analytics team, and strong consumer product insights capability, including agency partners. Requirements Ideal Candidate Possesses These Attributes:
Proven track record of functional expertise around marketing analytics to drive business growth Analytic problem solving skills, with an ability both to see the big picture and delve into details Ability to multi-task, run multiple projects, manage multiple vendors and consistently deliver in a fast paced, fact based work environment. Solid experience influencing and leading cross-functional teams. Knowledge of more sophisticated modeling techniques to effectively manage third party providers in the execution of certain projects Excellent analytic and complex problem solving ability Excellent communication skills (written and oral), organization & planning skills Extremely high attention to details Qualifications & Skills:
BS/BA Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Mathematics or other quantitative fields. Equivalent combination of education and experience considered. Proficient in data support languages and tools (e.g. SQL, SAS and Python) Highly experienced in creating reports and dashboards in a modern data visualization tool (i.e. PowerBI) Familiarity with web analytics tools (i.e. GA) Minimum of 3 years of experience required
Salary Range:
$80K -- $100K
Minimum Qualification
Marketing Research & AnalysisEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
